alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 8:49PM CST until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Kaskaskia River at Carlyle TW. Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Eureka. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kaskaskia River at Carlyle TW. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CST Sunday the stage was 423.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM CST Sunday was 423.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 423.8 feet. - Flood stage is 423.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Kaskaskia River Carlyle TW 423.5 423.8 Sun 8 pm 423.8 423.8 423.8 423.8 423. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
